name: Bigger.io - Stranger Fight
description:
Stranger Fight - Battle Arena

There is an stranger among us, but who is him ? They are all hidden behind the astronaut suits, and you have to be careful with every one. Then, the only one choice is to battle, and to be the last man standing on the arena.

Find the stranger, attack and destroy them. We can not travel far to Jupiter if any stranger exist here. That's very dangerous for us all. And we don't accept any of them among us.

Who are you ? An stranger or a real astronaut. Join the battle arena to find out.

Stranger Fight - Battle Arena, is a super simple game, here are some key feature you should know:
- Simple move: Drag to move, release your finger to attack the stranger close in your range.
- Unlock skins and weapon to suit up
- Upgrade skills to fight better in Zombie Crowd City mode.
- Fight dangerous enemy in Battle Arena survival mode, unlock new zones, unlock challenge

Thank you,
ABI GAME STUDIO
